overview: Retired CIA operative Jack "Crash" Riley  is called back into action when a deadly and beautiful bio-terrorist threatens to loose a virus that could destroy an entire nation. Paired with a young DEA agent named Roman Byrnes who has a reputation for being a loose canon, Riley must stop this wily terrorist before she unleashes one of the world's deadliest viruses
tagline: Terrorism doesn't stand a chanceâ€¦ if they don't kill each other first.
title: Crash and Byrnes
